EmailTemplate.name: Brand Campaign LPs.Banking Email 3.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Behind the Branch Manager’s Door…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You and other financial institutions have to move faster than ever.
You’re going contactless. Accelerating your digital banking initiatives, rethinking your branch strategy. And addressing revenue challenges.
We’ve got a simple new ebook that can help you, and it’s free.
And just in time for holiday spending season. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> P.S. When you’re backed by NCR, it’s simple to get ahead. We’re like your mission control behind the branch manager’s door. Grab the ebook <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/backed-by-ncr]]> and see if it helps!
